(()=>{function v({getGlobal:t,setGlobal:p,translateArguments:c,syncItemsCallback:i,usesKeyboardCallback:b,usesPinchZoomCallback:u,usesPageZoomCallback:d}){let n={},m=t();p(function(...e){let r=c({originalArguments:e,accessibilityEventParameters:n});m.apply(window,r)});try{l({mediaFeature:"prefers-reduced-motion",abbreviation:"prm",possibleValues:["no-preference","reduce"]}),l({mediaFeature:"prefers-color-scheme",abbreviation:"pcs",possibleValues:["light","dark"]}),l({mediaFeature:"inverted-colors",abbreviation:"ic",possibleValues:["none","inverted"]}),l({mediaFeature:"forced-colors",abbreviation:"fc",possibleValues:["none","active"]}),l({mediaFeature:"prefers-contrast",abbreviation:"pc",possibleValues:["no-preference","more","less","custom"]}),i&&i()}catch(o){console.error(o)}(function(){try{let e=setInterval(function(){let a=document.querySelector(":focus-visible");if(!a)return;let s=a.tagName.toUpperCase();s==="INPUT"||s==="TEXTAREA"||s==="SELECT"||a.contentEditable!=="true"&&(n.uk=!0,clearInterval(e),b&&b())},500)}catch(e){console.error(e)}})(),function(){try{let e=window.visualViewport.scale,r=setInterval(function(){window.visualViewport.scale!==e&&(n.upiz=!0,clearInterval(r),u&&u())},500)}catch(e){console.error(e)}}(),function(){try{let e=window.devicePixelRatio,r=setInterval(function(){window.devicePixelRatio!==e&&(n.upaz=!0,clearInterval(r),d&&d())},500)}catch(e){console.error(e)}}();function l({mediaFeature:o,abbreviation:e,possibleValues:r}){if(h({mediaFeature:o})===!1)return;let s=r.map(f=>({possibleValue:f,mediaQueryResult:window.matchMedia(\`(\${o}: \${f})\`).matches})).find(({_:f,mediaQueryResult:y})=>y===!0);if(s===void 0){console.error(\`Something went wrong. Is there a new \${o} allowed value not accounted for here?\`);return}n[e]=s.possibleValue}function h({mediaFeature:o}){return window.matchMedia(\`not all and (\${o}), (\${o})\`).matches?!0:(console.warn(\`Your browser doesn't support \${o} yet\`),!1)}}function w(){v({getGlobal:()=>window.plausible,setGlobal:t=>{window.plausible=t},translateArguments:({originalArguments:t,accessibilityEventParameters:p})=>{let c=[...t],i=t[1],u={...i?.props,...p},d={...i,props:u};return c[1]=d,c},syncItemsCallback:globalThis.a11y_analytics_config?.providers?.plausible?.callbacks?.onSyncItemsResolved,usesKeyboardCallback:globalThis.a11y_analytics_config?.providers?.plausible?.callbacks?.onUsesKeyboardResolved,usesPinchZoomCallback:globalThis.a11y_analytics_config?.providers?.plausible?.callbacks?.onUsesPinchZoomResolved,usesPageZoomCallback:globalThis.a11y_analytics_config?.providers?.plausible?.callbacks?.onUsesPageZoomResolved})}w();})();
